title: Complete project documentation
description: Write detailed documentation for the project, including setup instructions and API details.

title: Fix login bug
description: Resolve the issue where users cannot log in with special characters in their password.

title: Design homepage banner
description: Create a new banner for the homepage to promote the upcoming sale.

title: Prepare presentation for Q1 review
description: Prepare a slide deck summarizing the team's performance and achievements for Q1.

title: Update dependencies
description: Upgrade all project dependencies to the latest stable versions.

title: Conduct user interviews
description: Schedule and conduct interviews with 5 users to gather feedback on the latest feature release.

title: Write unit tests for payment module
description: Add unit tests to cover edge cases in the payment module.

title: Optimize database queries
description: Identify and optimize slow database queries to improve application performance.

title: Team building activity
description: Organize a team building activity to improve collaboration and morale.

title: Finalize marketing campaign
description: Collaborate with the marketing team to finalize the campaign strategy for Q2.
